fr = new FileReader("/sdcard/a.txt"); 
    buf = new BufferedReader(fr);

try { 
    String s = buf.readLine(); 
    while(s!=null) 
    { 
      System.out.println(s); 
      s =buf.readLine(); 

    } 
  } 
  catch (IOException ex1) { 
    ex1.printStackTrace(); 
  }

finally{ 
    try { 
      buf.close(); 
      fr.close(); 
    } 
    catch (IOException ex2) { 
      ex2.printStackTrace(); 
    } 
  }
